# About

The COVID-19 challenge is an effort to set a direct communication channel between field epidemiologists, infectious disease modellers and R developers to fill existing needs in analysis tools for the response to COVID-19. 

Through this task managing platform:

* field agents will be able to easily submit requests (LINK TO CREATE TASK) regarding specific RECON package development needs such as (cf ppt)
* volunteer R developers will be able to easily browse all open tasks (LINK TO EXPLORE) and bring their help where it is most useful
